scripts.build: npm run validate && npm run build:html && npm run build:pdf
scripts.build:custom: npm run validate && npm run build:html:custom && npm run build:pdf:custom
scripts.dev: npm run build && npm run serve
scripts.dev:custom: npm run build:custom && npm run serve
scripts.theme:copy: if not exist themes\custom\dist mkdir themes\custom\dist && xcopy /E /I /Y theme-src\dist\* themes\custom\dist
scripts.theme:rebuild: npm run theme:build && npm run theme:copy && npm run theme:link
scripts.theme:dev: npm run theme:rebuild && npm run build:custom && npm run serve
scripts.clean: if exist node_modules rmdir /s /q node_modules & if exist theme-src\node_modules rmdir /s /q theme-src\node_modules & if exist theme-src\dist rmdir /s /q theme-src\dist & if exist themes\custom\dist rmdir /s /q themes\custom\dist & if exist package-lock.json del /f package-lock.json
